info.title: Guardian API
info.description: Auto-generated skeleton from current routes. Refine schemas & examples as needed.

put.description:
Assign or update a patient's nurse and/or caretaker.

**Parameter sources accepted**:
- **Path**: `patientId` (required by route)
- **Query string (URL)**: `patientId`, `nurseId`, `caretakerId`
- **Request body (JSON)**: `patientId`, `nurseId`, `caretakerId`

**Precedence**: When duplicated across sources, values are resolved in this order:
1) Path param, 2) Query param, 3) Request body.

parameters.name: patientId
parameters.description: Patient id from the URL path.

parameters.name: patientId
parameters.description: Optional patient id in the query string; path takes precedence.

parameters.name: nurseId
parameters.description: Optional nurse id in the query string.

parameters.name: caretakerId
parameters.description: Optional caretaker id in the query string.

patientId.description: Optional patient id in body; path/query take precedence.

get.description: Returns a paginated roster of patients visible to the admin. Supports keyset pagination via `cursor`.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by name, email, or patient code.
